name: Absolute Nightmare Zero
description:
Our game is a first person horror game. The player will find them self, in an abandoned space station environment, the main goal/focus is to find out what happened there. While progressing through the game the player has to collect 8 bits of information through the consoles on the station… And remember to watch your back… There's something strange about those shadows.

Made by James Pawley and Aivaras Salna

Audio made by Ollie Ryles

Controls

Movement : W,A,S,D

Look : Mouse

Pick up information : E

Toggle Torch : F
